game_description: Portfolio App and VR player to enjoy the tours created with 3DVista VT PRO. Connect your Oculus headset to your computer and import your VR tours created with 3DVista VT PRO. When running the app on your Oculus headset, simply select from the list of available tours to run the experience in VR from anywhere and without an internet connection. Some parts of the app are based on open source software covered by MPL 2.0: https://www.3dvista.com/vrapp-ffr (repository)
review_1: I mean, never did. I Installed it and ran it with my surprise, it just doesn't load the tours I copied in the 3dvista folder. I tried on MQ2 and did fine. Is it there any solution? I am used to my OQ1, it's a pitty my favorite App 3dvista just dont work.
review_2: No idea why the app isn't responding on my new oculus quest 2 device. It was working great on my previous device just few days ago. What happened?
review_3: Few days ago worked not working at all!!!!
review_4: Since March 23 the App won’t open any more in the headset and I can’t figure out why. Last December it works very well. Can anybody tell me why?
review_5: Since this morning the APP wont load, it pops up with three white oscillating dots & immediatly shuts down. Running QUEST 2, OS 49068160412800150
